data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yuan, Yuan, Ji, Xiao-Hong, Chen, Jia-Jia, Dai, Yu-Cheng (2017): Three new species of Megasporia (Polyporales, Basidiomycota) from China. MycoKeys 20: 37-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.20.11816, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.20.11816
